# Haxe Roundup № 132

Juraj, author of the amazing tinkerbell library, has shown some code for his new library tinx_node.

How about an embeddable haxe http server? Apparently all hacked together in one night! by tong.

Hugh, the original? creator of NME has the CPP target and NME running at 60fps on the Raspberry Pi!

With an Haxe 3 release candidate apparently due for the end of January / early February, Haxe SVN just got Array comprehension.

François the developer behind Strange Masks thats built with NME, has several new posts worth checking out, in game video's, resources and reviews.

Christopher has written about NME Tiled : NME + TILED = <3.

If your using FlashDevelop, then checkout the handy templates created by Mark Knol.

If you use Flambe, version 2.1 has been released!

And to end this weeks roundup, Mike Cann has updated his Chrome extension PostToTumblr, which is used by 30k+ people. Awesome :D

çois"
